articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and Mongolia
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and Mongolia
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- There took place talks between Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and B. Battsetseg, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia, here on Wednesday.
					 They exchanged views on the issues of further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with long history and tradition under the present complicated situation and revitalizing the exchange and cooperation between the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and the Mongolian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade and the issue of mutual concern and reached a consensus of views.

articles.title: Credentials from Cambodian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials from Cambodian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Sin Bunthoeurn, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Pyongyang Exchange Group of Disabled Persons Leaves for UK
articles.content:
Pyongyang Exchange Group of Disabled Persons Leaves for UK
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang exchange group of disabled persons led by Kim Mun Chol, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, left here on Wednesday to give a performance in the UK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian Party
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a floral basket and a congratulatory message from Norodom Ranariddh, chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, on the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The basket and message were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Cambodia on May 10 by the advisor to the chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party.
					
					 Saying that Chairman Norodom Ranariddh and all the members of the Party extend the warmest congratulations and wishes to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on the first anniversary of his election as the chairman of the WPK, the advisor heartily hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in building a socialist power under his leadership.

articles.title: Rajin-Vladivostok International Tourist Liner Leaves
articles.content:
Rajin-Vladivostok International Tourist Liner Leaves
 Rason, May 17 (KCNA) -- Rajin-Vladivostok international tourist liner Mangyongbong will be operated by common efforts of the DPRK and Russia. 
					 A ceremony of setting Mangyongbong sail for Vladivostok took place at Rajin Port Wednesday. 
					
					 Present there were officials of the Rason City People's Committee, officials concerned, Russian guests including the consul general of the Russian Federation in Chongjin and tourists.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made at the ceremony. 
					
					 Mangyongbong's operation as Rajin-Vladivostok international tourist liner will make a positive contribution to developing marine transport and economic cooperation and tourism between the two countries.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Fisheries Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Fisheries Held
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of fisheries was held at the Sci-Tech Complex on May 16 and 17 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were at least 150 scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of ten-odd units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Wonsan University of Fisheries, Nampho University of Fisheries, the Institute of Fishery of the Ministry of Fisheries and the Kangwon Provincial Fishery Management Bureau.
					
					 More than 140 papers were presented at the presentation. They were divided into panels including fishery and fish farming.
					
					 Successes which solved scientific and technical problems arising in increasing the production of marine products and experience were presented.
					
					 A lecture "on bio bait for fish farming" was given.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Players Return from 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Return from 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back on Wednesday after taking part in the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship held in New Delhi of India.
					 In the championship, Kim Han Song and Kim Son Hyang of the DPRK placed second each in men's freestyle wrestling 61kg and women's wrestling 48kg and Ri Sin Myong and Jong Myong Suk third each in men's Greco-roman wrestling 59kg and women's wrestling 53kg.

articles.title: Diverse Korean Folk Music Tunes
articles.content:
Diverse Korean Folk Music Tunes
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean folk music is said to be characterized by diverse energetic tunes.
					 Therefore, the tunes of the Korean folk music come to be an important expression of national features and emotion.
					
					 Among them are jungmori tune producing soft and elegant impression, jajunmori tune giving cheerful and rhythmic feeling and jinyangjo tune tugging at heartstrings.
					
					 Those tunes play a role of accompanying main melodies to promote their colors and are mainly executed by percussion instruments like Janggu and drum.

articles.title: New High-Yielding Seed Bean Cultivated in DPRK
articles.content:
New High-Yielding Seed Bean Cultivated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Agricultural Science in the DPRK recently cultivated new high-yielding seed bean and distributed it to farms throughout the country.
					 The seed bean agrees with the climatic and soil conditions of the country and is high in per-hectare yield and ecologically stable.
					
					 It can be cultivated as main crop in all bean-growing lands south of east coastal Pukchong area and west coastal Jongju area.
					
					 And it is 1.2-1.3 times higher than other seed beans in per-hectare yield and can be planted as a later crop or a catch crop.

articles.title: Wave of Jubilation Sweeps DPRK
articles.content:
Wave of Jubilation Sweeps DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are seized with great joy, upon receiving the news about the successful test-fire of ground-to-ground med- to-long range missile Hwasong-12.
					 They regard the successful test-fire as a noteworthy event in the history of building a Juche-oriented nuclear power, a great victory in the centuries-long confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Ri Song Il, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), said.
					
					 The successful test-fire of our "Juche weapon" is the great event which demonstrated the might of self-reliant defence industry of Juche Korea as a nuclear power in the East and a rocket launching power in Asia.
					
					 If the U.S. awkwardly attempts to provoke the DPRK, it will not escape from the biggest disaster.
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces equipped with more precise and diversified nukes and nuclear striking means will surely destroy the strongholds of aggression forces and evils.
					
					 Han Chol Man, a worker of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, said that the successful test-fire fully demonstrated the might of Juche Korea and its potentialities.
					
					 Ko Kyong Nam, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to officials, scientists and technicians in the field of rocket research. The birth of "Juche weapon" is another demonstration of the spirit of socialist Korea advancing toward the final victory by dint of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 I feel refreshed and encouraged by the news about successful rocket test-fire and come to renew the faith that only victory and glory are in store for Juche Korea only when advancing along the road indicated by the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits at U.S.' Projected Intelligence Operation against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits at U.S.' Projected Intelligence Operation against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. scales up its intelligence operation against the DPRK after setting up an integrated body and machineries specializing in collecting information on the DPRK in its administration and CIA recently. 
					 Against the backdrop, the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea are going to resume the operation of the "anti-north intelligence unit" called 524 Intelligence Battalion in October. Spies and saboteurs will be involved in the operation.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 The projected resumption of the intelligence unit's operation is just a sly trick of the U.S. to use spies for filling the gap in the operation of its spy satellites and reconnaissance planes.
					
					 The scheme fully revealed that "maximum pressure and engagement" put up by the Trump administration as its DPRK policy is just a policy of state-sponsored terrorism aimed at "eliminating the supreme leadership" of the DPRK and "bringing down its social system."
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, a den of evils that should be wiped off the face of the earth as early as possible as it is openly pursuing the policy of state-sponsored terrorism by unhesitatingly resorting to hideous provocation, far from learning a lesson from the failed DPRK policy of its predecessors.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that its desperate intelligence operation against the DPRK will only bring destruction to it.
					
					 The foolhardy operations against the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its strategic facilities only bring to light the wretched plight of the U.S. which has sustained disgraceful defeats only in the showdown with the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. and Its Vassal Forces for Trying to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. and Its Vassal Forces for Trying to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- As already disclosed by the statement of a spokesman for the Ministry of State Security of the DPRK, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet intelligence service's frantic campaign to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK has reached its intolerable phase, comments Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The recently disclosed most base crime is nothing but the most vicious challenge and a declaration of war in a bid to destroy the spiritual mainstay the Korean people are absolutely trusting and relying on and to eclipse their great sun.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces have increased nuclear threat and blackmail to subdue the DPRK but this campaign resulted in the emergence of the DPRK as the world's military power and nuclear power in the East.
					
					 They run the whole gamut of nuclear threat and blackmail and sanctions to force the DPRK to dismantle nuclear weapons，but their scenarios found unworkable, prompting them to foolishly seek to bring down its social system in a crafty manner.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have formed manifold bullet shields to protect their supreme leader, the most outstanding and greatest in the world. They will let the U.S. clearly realize what rival it has to confront.
					
					 The U.S. will always regret in the tomb that it is a daydream for the U.S. to try to eclipse the sun with bloodstained palm and how disastrous it will entail consequence.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Sickening Conduct of S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Sickening Conduct of S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The disgusting farce of the group of the "Liberal Korea Party" and pro-Park Geun Hye betes noires in south Korea was again disclosed to become laughing stock of people.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes this in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Hong Jun Phyo trumpeted about "great unity of conservatives" and "payment of pro-north left-wing forces" as a candidate with "Liberal Korea Party" ticket while vicious conservatives who were expelled from the party on charges of "liquidation of pro-Park group" were reinstated. Those who defected from the "Parun Party" came to their fold. Meanwhile, the pro-Park betes noires including the "Association of Love for Park Geun Hye" also approached close around the "Liberal Korea Party," arguing "it is impossible to cast their lot with the pro-north left-wing faction" and "they stand at the crossroads of life and death".
					
					 This is nothing but the reckless moves of bete noires having no elementary sensibility of the reality and those more dead than alive making desperate efforts to grasp at straws in ruin.
					
					 It is quite natural that traitor Park Geun Hye was impeached and stand trial as she ran amuck for hideous misrule against the people, fascist dictatorship, confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war moves against the north and that the puppet conservative group and pro-Park bete noires have to bear all charges challenging the people's minds to face history's judgement, being engrossed in evil deeds with Park.
					
					 That's why the south Korean people had already turned their backs on the treacherous group such as scum of the "Liberal Korea Party" and conservative bete noires long ago.
					
					 It is an ardent desire and will of the south Korean people to bury the rotten and politically deformed guys and human rejects in the tomb of the history and bring about a new politics and life.

articles.title: Korean Woman in U.S. Demands U.S. President Ensure Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Korean Woman in U.S. Demands U.S. President Ensure Peace on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- An Un Hui, Korean woman in the U.S., sent a letter to U.S. President Trump on April 26 calling for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula on behalf of such women leaders as academics, business world, civic and social circles and military origin of 40 countries including the DPRK and those of countries which took part in the Korean War. 
					 Diplomacy is the only way of defusing the danger of a nuclear war and that of a war prevailing on the peninsula, the letter said, adding:
					
					 Korea is the only country which has not been reunified since it divided into two parts as the results of the Second World War.
					
					 The letter demanded the present U.S. president do the following things in order to prevent a war in Korea and ensure peace on the peninsula.
					
					 He should start the peace process by replacing the 1953 Korean Armistice Agreement by binding peace treaty and thus putting an end to the Korean war.
					
					 The Korean peninsula has been exposed to nuclear weapons, etc. since 1950 and this threat has made the Koreans always uneasy.
					
					 The recent deployment of the THAAD in south Korea is increasing tensions in the north and the south and the neighboring countries.
					
					 Peace is the most powerful war deterrent.
					
					 The letter believes that only when the U.S. president will establish peace mechanism on the peninsula to take the measure for terminating the Korean war, can he bring lasting peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association posted on its internet homepage the work of President Kim Il Sung "Go All Out for Victory in the War" on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The work is a radio address to all the Korean people made by the President on June 26, Juche 39(1950), one day after the Korean War broke out.
					
					 It deals with the efforts of the DPRK government for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the aggression aims of the war ignited by the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique.
					
					 It indicates the tasks for winning the final victory in the war.
					
					 The homepage carried portraits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Mexican National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun posted on its internet homepage the full text of "Let Us Usher in a Golden Age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement", a speech made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The speech clarifies that 70 years of the youth league is a history of brilliant victories of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's unique idea of prioritizing the youth and their wise guidance and a history of ardent loyalty and patriotic devotion with which the young people of Korea have supported the Party and the leader, the country and the people.
					
					 It also advances the tasks and ways facing the youth league.
					
					 The homepage carried portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador camboyano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador camboyano
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio el dia 17 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Camboya en Corea, Sin Bunthoeurn.
					Tras el recibo, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Sale hacia Vladivostok el barco de turismo internacional "Mangyongbong"
articles.content:
Sale hacia Vladivostok el barco de turismo internacional "Mangyongbong"
Rason, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Corea y Rusia operaran en conjunto el barco "Mangyongbong" para el turismo internacional Rajin-Vladivostok.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Puerto de Rajin la ceremonia de zarpa de la nave turistica.
					
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Rason y los otros interesados y los huespedes rusos, incluso el consul general en Chongjin, y los turistas.
					
					Hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Acto seguido, "Mangyongbong" salio hacia Vladivostok.
					
					La operacion del barco contribuira mucho al desarrollo del transporte maritimo, la cooperacion economica y el turismo entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena intento de EE.UU. de intensificar actividades de inteligencia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena intento de EE.UU. de intensificar actividades de inteligencia
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, EE.UU. intensifica la campana de inteligencia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. A citar ejemplos, instalo en la administracion y la CIA una organizacion integral y los aparatos especializados en el manejo de las informaciones sobre la RPDC. 
					Asimismo, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea reiniciaran desde octubre que viene las actividades de la "unidad de inteligencia anti-Norte", conocida como batallon de inteligencia 524, en que se incorporaran los espias, escorias humanas y otros saboteadores. 
					
					En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun precisa que la reoperacion del batallon norteamericano parte del siniestro intento de cubrir con las actividades de inteligencia del hombre el vacio que hay en el espionaje con satelites o aeronaves, y continua:
					
					Tales hechos demuestran que la "maxima presion e intervencion", presentada por la administracion Trump, es la politica de terrorismo de Estado para "eliminar la Direccion Suprema" de la RPDC y "derrocar su regimen". 
					
					Lejos de sacar la leccion de la fracasada politica hostil a la RPDC de su antecesora, la nueva administracion norteamericana promueve abiertamente la politica de terrorismo de Estado cometiendo provocaciones sin precedentes.
					
					EE.UU. es la fuente del mal que debe ser desaparecida lo mas pronto posible de nuestro planeta.
					
					Ese pais debe tener presente que sus maniobras de inteligencia anti-RPDC le llevaran al arruinamiento y a la muerte. 
					
					La desesperada campana de EE.UU. contra la Direccion Suprema y los blancos estrategicos de la RPDC pone de relieve la situacion miserable del primero que viene sufriendo derrotas vergonzosas en la confrontacion con la segunda que continua de siglo en siglo.

articles.title: Minju Joson ironiza conducta asquerosa de banda conservadora surcoreana
articles.content:
Minju Joson ironiza conducta asquerosa de banda conservadora surcoreana
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo de las elecciones "presidenciales" en el Sur de Corea, se conocio nuevamente el atributo repugnante de la banda del Partido de Corea Libre y la chusma pro-Park Geun-hye, de que se burla ahora todo el mundo.
					 Hong Jun Phyo, candidato "presidencial" por el "Partido de Corea Libre", pronuncio unos disparates tales como la "gran unidad de conservadores" y la "eliminacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte" y permitio reingresar al partido a los magnates conservadores, que habian sido expulsados del partido durante la "limpieza de las fuerzas pro-Park", y hasta a los que salieron voluntariamente para componer el otro "Partido Parun".
					
					  Por otra parte, los elementos pro-Park tambien se unieron al "Partido de Corea Libre" diciendo que "no pueden depositar el destino en las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte" y "estan en el dilema de vida o muerte".
					
					  Esto no pasa de ser una locura de las escorias humanas que sin tener el sentido elemental ni la capacidad de distinguir la realidad, hacen esfuerzos desesperados por evitar el arruinamiento.
					
					  Asi ironiza el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					  Por sus inauditos crimenes cometidos desafiando a la opinion publica, fue dimitida y sometida al juicio la traidora Park Geun-hye quien recurria con frenesi a la infame politica antipopular, la dictadura fascista, la confrontacion fratricida y las maniobras de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Sus complices conservadores y partidarios tambien estan a punto de ser condenados por la historia.
					
					  Ya hace mucho tiempo, los habitantes surcoreanos dieron espaldas a esos traidores, incluyendo los tipejos del "Partido de Corea Libre" y los conservadores.
					
					  Crear nueva politica y nueva vida enterrando cuanto antes en la tumba de la historia a los politicos deformados y basuras humanas, esto es la aspiracion y voluntad de la poblacion surcoreana.
